channel.title: How to make my PK area where they don't loose items on death I'm an AMATEURCODER

I really want the people to stop whining about, GBS, and people keeping and looting. Please, oh PLEASE tell me how to do this.
I'm an amateur coder

@wontonz wrote:

I’m really, really sorry. I just learned a little bit of java. I do not understand what you are trying to get me to do?

item.title: How to make my PK area where they don't loose items on death I'm an AMATEURCODER
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Declare a boolean that is like nonWild, it checks certain perimeters of coordinates. Then you need to make else-if statements to your youdied() method.

A hint of such would be: (note this is not in your method…)

if(funzone()) { tele = 3333; tele = 3333; } else if (!funzone()) { stuff }

Or you could use:

if(funzone()) { tele = 3333; tele = 3333; } else { removeitems(); whatever }

Although very stupid code, it’s an example.

Read full topic
